text: hey joseline with Walter's world murkier
in Tokyo and thank you I've been getting
a lot of requests to do more videos on
traveling with kids so I'm gonna give
you just three really quick ideas for
traveling with little ones on long
flights and things and I'll do a longer
in-depth video later but this is just
kind of to whet your appetite so um
first and foremost kids are usually
screaming and crying on planes because
their ears are popping and so be
prepared for that is there little tiny
things give them you know pacifiers and
things like that it's also a good idea
to have a bottle even even when my kids
were two and three I'd have a bottle
because it would kind of soothe their
ears and cause them to uncock as they
were going so um that's a really good
one have something drink and along with
that it's always good to have some easy
total snacks and maybe some that you
know jump saying they're closed and art
all over the place and secondly messes
happen and so you definitely need to
have a change of clothes often we took
our kids just in jammies and easily
changeable kind of things something
happened it was really it was it was a
quick change because you don't have a
lot of space on an airplane obviously so
that's good along with that number three
bring wipes baby wipes will save your
butt no pun intended
baby unintended anyway all sorts of
messes I still even though our kids are
6 and 11 I'm still carrying a lot of
wipes in my purse at all the times
they're super helpful so those are three
quick tips and I hope you enjoyed them
and
so long from Tokyo Zoo
